Review Text: Really really good food!! Halal! The hummus, tabooleh salad, and chicken were amongst our favourites. Decor is beautiful and the vibe and area are great too. We enjoyed it so much that we went twice in four days!! Would highly recommend!

Name: Sham
Review Text: We have had dinner a few times. Always extremely friendly service, with delicious food. They have a particularly special table by the window, a true delight in sunny days with best view by the water. The salad with bread and the tartare are my favourites.

Name: Sham
Review Text: My wife and I loved dining here. The food is out of this world. REALLY DELICIOUS!!! The kebab and this Syrian round dish were a delight. Definitely recommend it. Btw, the window seats make for a really romantic sitting.

Name: Sham
Review Text: I've been to Sham twice, once with a Syrian friend of mine and the second time with three Dutch friends. Both times the food was delicious, the personnel correct and helpful and the price quality relationship good. Whether you've never had Syrian food or are a great fan, go to Sham for a good dinner.
